pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NSLS-IIRepository of tools used for both data collection and analysis at NSLS-II.This is a home for facility-wide tools: code that is generalized for use atmultiple beamlines but not necessarily generalized for use at multiplefacilties.For an overview of the NSLS-II software see the[NSLS2 software overview](http://nsls-ii.github.io).
